headline: Michael Burry Sounds Alarm On Palantir, Flags CEO Alex Karp's 'Elevated' $17.2 Million Private Jet Tab
summary: The “Big Short” investor Michael Burry has targeted Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) again after the company's latest annual filing revealed CEO Alex Karp's private jet expenses surged to over $17 million, sparking a debate over corporate governance and executive perks. Stratospheric Spending According to Palantir's Form 10-K, the company reimbursed CEO Karp $17.2 million for the use of his “Executive Aircraft” in 2025. This figure represents a massive 123% increase from the $7.7 million
